start: ^A long time ago , a couple of skeletons stole my ring.
^It would be nice if I could get it back.
^By chance , have you come across my ring?
noRing: ^Come back if you find my ring.
failure: ^Looks like you don't have it.Come back if you find my ring.
postCompletion: ^Thanks for helping me earlier.Good luck with your adventure!
